title: Aquitted
description: Elle stared at the very attractive man sitting opposite her in the prison cell, she was going to free this murderer. She had no way of stopping this. Either she help him get free or he kill her family... She was in hell.WARNING: THIS BOOK IS RECOMMENDED FOR READERS AGED 18 YEARS AND OVER. IT CONTAINS VIOLENCE, SEX, AND SUBMISSION.
author: E.L. Beth
